I Reckon <S%G3049><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Worthy <S%G514><s%> Are The <S%G3588><s%> Sufferings <S%G3804><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Present <S%G3568><s%> Time To Be Compared <S%G2540><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G3195><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> To Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But We Know <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3956><s%> Work Together <S%G4903><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> Good, <S%G18><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> Purpose <S%G4286><s%> Called <S%G2822><s%> Are. <S%G5607><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Foreknew, <S%G4267><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Predestinated To Be <S%G4309><s%> Conformed <S%G4832><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The Image <S%G1504><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> His <S%G5207><s%> Son, <S%G846><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Be <S%G1511><s%> Him The <S%G846><s%> Firstborn <S%G4416><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Brethren. <S%G80><s%>

But <S%G3739><s%> Whom <S%G1161><s%> He Predestinated <S%G4309><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Called; <S%G2564><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Called, <S%G2564><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Justified; <S%G1344><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> He Justified, <S%G1344><s%> These <S%G5128><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> He Glorified. <S%G1392><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Shall We Say <S%G2046><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> These Things? <S%G5023><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God Be <S%G2316><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Us? <S%G2257><s%>

Who He <S%G5101><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2632><s%> <S%G2632><s%> It Is Christ <S%G5547><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Died, <S%G599><s%> <S%G3123><s%> But Rather <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Is Raised Up; <S%G1453><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Us <S%G2076><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> The Right Hand <S%G1188><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Intercedes <S%G1793><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> Us : <S%G2257><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Shall Separate <S%G5563><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%> Tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Strait, <S%G4730><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Persecution, <S%G1375><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Famine, <S%G3042><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Nakedness <S%G1132><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Danger, <S%G2794><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Sword? <S%G3162><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> These Things <S%G5125><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> We More Than Overcome <S%G5245><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> Him Who <S%G3588><s%> Loved <S%G25><s%> Us. <S%G2248><s%>
